name: part_001
file: tmp_【ラミィ生誕記念2022】今年も好き放題やります！100万円晩酌【 #やかまし100万円飲み会 ⧸ホロライブ】 [hzmimWcN34Q]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_001.mov

scenes.description: Yukihana Lamy performs her original song 'Fleur' on stage.
Yukihana Lamy, Houshou Marine, Inugami Korone, and Shirogane Noel perform 'The☆Peace!' together.

subtitles.original: 一言くらいあるよねってそっと
subtitles.english: "At least say something," I thought as I softly...

subtitles.original: 寄り添ってあげたいな
subtitles.english: ...wanted to stay close to you.

subtitles.original: 終わらないでと願う 大切なモーメント
subtitles.english: Wishing it would never end, this precious moment.

subtitles.original: 知りたくても知りたくはないの ここに閉じ込めて
subtitles.english: Even if I want to know, I don't want to know. Lock it away here.

subtitles.original: たった一つだけのわがまま 叶えてくれるかな
subtitles.english: Will you grant me my only selfish wish?

subtitles.original: 一番にしてよね
subtitles.english: Make me your number one.

subtitles.original: 運命と言うには まだまだ足りない
subtitles.english: To call it destiny, it's still not enough.

subtitles.original: でもずっと君だけを
subtitles.english: But I'll always only be...

subtitles.original: 見てるよ
subtitles.english: ...looking at you.

subtitles.original: 雪が煌めくこの花束
subtitles.english: This bouquet where the snow sparkles...

subtitles.original: 抱えて祈ってる 君に渡せるように
subtitles.english: ...I hold it and pray, so that I can give it to you.

subtitles.original: 指先が震える まだかな
subtitles.english: My fingertips are trembling. Is it time yet?

subtitles.original: 待ってるね
subtitles.english: I'll be waiting.

subtitles.original: いつだってこの思い
subtitles.english: Always, this feeling...

subtitles.original: 届けよ
subtitles.english: ...reach you!

subtitles.original: 好きだよ
subtitles.english: I love you.

subtitles.original: ほら行こうぜ そうだみんな行こうぜ
subtitles.english: Hey, let's go! That's right, everyone let's go!

subtitles.original: さあほら歌おうぜ そうだみんな歌おうぜ
subtitles.english: Come on, let's sing! That's right, everyone let's sing!

subtitles.original: ほら誓おうぜ そうだみんな誓おうぜ
subtitles.english: Hey, let's make a vow! That's right, everyone let's make a vow!

subtitles.original: さあほら愛そうぜ 最高級で愛そうぜ
subtitles.english: Come on, let's love! Let's love with the highest quality!

subtitles.original: ザ☆ピ〜ス！
subtitles.english: The☆Peace!

subtitles.original: ほら行こうぜ Everybody Get Up!
subtitles.english: Hey, let's go! Everybody Get Up!

subtitles.original: うちらが住む未来だぜ Let's Get Up! Get Up!
subtitles.english: It's the future we live in! Let's Get Up! Get Up!

subtitles.original: Everybody Peace! 意味ないけどコンビニが好き
subtitles.english: Everybody Peace! For no reason, I like convenience stores!

subtitles.original: Ha Ha Ha Ha...
subtitles.english: Ha Ha Ha Ha...

subtitles.original: ピザポテトだぜ ふるさとには さら一週間帰ろう
subtitles.english: Pizza potato! Let's go back to our hometown for another week.

subtitles.original: 英会話スクール 肺活量 行けてないぜ
subtitles.english: English conversation school, lung capacity, I haven't gone!

subtitles.original: Ha Ha Ha Ha...
subtitles.english: Ha Ha Ha Ha...

subtitles.original: ほら行こうぜ Peace Peace!
subtitles.english: Hey, let's go! Peace Peace!

subtitles.original: ほら行こうぜ Peace Peace!
subtitles.english: Hey, let's go! Peace Peace!

subtitles.original: 選挙の日って ウチらまじか
subtitles.english: Election day... are we serious?

subtitles.original: 投票行って 外食するんだ
subtitles.english: Go to vote, and then eat out.

subtitles.original: ワンダフル 素敵な未来 描くなくらい 凄いデンジャラス Let's Go!
subtitles.english: Wonderful! Drawing a lovely future... so dangerous! Let's Go!

subtitles.original: 好きな人が優しかった
subtitles.english: The person I like was kind.

subtitles.original: 嬉しい出来事が増えました
subtitles.english: Happy events have increased.

subtitles.original: 大事な人がわかってくれた
subtitles.english: The person important to me understood.

subtitles.original: 感動的な出来事となりました
subtitles.english: It became a moving event.

subtitles.original: Wow Wow Wow Wow Peace Peace!
subtitles.english: Wow Wow Wow Wow Peace Peace!

subtitles.original: ほら行こうぜ Everybody Peace!
subtitles.english: Hey, let's go! Everybody Peace!

subtitles.original: いつも悩む AかBか Peace Peace!
subtitles.english: Always worrying, A or B? Peace Peace!

subtitles.original: 盛り上がり どこでもいいわ
subtitles.english: Getting excited... anywhere is fine.
